comment: It was her first semester ever teaching. She had a few breakdowns in the beginning. I and most of the students actually felt bad for her. As a person she will forever have my respect. She was a great and caring woman. She has a lot to work with on regards to teaching but I feel like once she gets the hang of it she will do awesome.

This was her first semester ever teaching, so she was also learning the information while we were, but since she knew this she was very understanding and helpful. I completely bombed a project and she let me come in and helped me through it and I got an A on it. She gives lots of extra credit. I only went to the first class and still made an A.

The worst professor I have ever taken. I wish there was a 0 rating on here because thats what I would give her. I did all of the work myself and taught myself thats why I got such a good grade. She was very lenient with grading because she was new and so bad at it. She even admitted how bad she was. I would highly recommend not taking this woman.
